items.title: Is the stock market open tomorrow? Here’s what to know for Inauguration Day and MLK Day.
items.description: The two major events fall on the same day — Jan. 20 — but most closures are because of MLK Day, which is a federal holiday.

items.title: ‘I am afraid to push the system for an answer’: I’m a firefighter, 57, from Oklahoma. If I die, will my husband be denied my pension?
items.description: “As you can probably guess, firefighters in same-sex relationships are not that common in Oklahoma.”

items.title: ‘He’s twice mentioned divorce’: My new husband told me he’ll have $500,000 for retirement, but he’s $80,000 in debt. How do I protect myself?
items.description: “Six months after we married, we had planned to get pre-qualified for a mortgage with the intention of selling both our homes.”

items.title: ‘I trust that my husband isn’t a gold digger’: I’m inheriting millions of dollars. My husband says I’m ‘selfish’ to keep it. Should I share it?
items.description: “I have been a stay-at-home mom for the past five years and my husband is the sole breadwinner.”

items.title: My wife, 72, and I, 80, have two houses and 56 acres of land. Our daughter is a joint tenant on our real estate. Do we need a will?
items.description: This couple has done a lot to clear the path ahead — but they have made one big mistake.
